This is what the directory structure looks like after Lee filter, normalization and contrast filtering, 
the scenes are stored in a new directory on the same format (.tiff)

data_cleaned_speckle_new
├── S1A_IW_GRDH_1SDV_20200126T052956_20200126T053025_030967_038E50_B43E.SAFE
